contest-event.event-date:
June 10, 1882 D Hardraw Scar
Hardraw Scar 0 Entertainments Contest Hardraw Scar hardraw-scar
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Green Dragon Inn, Hardraw, North Yorkshire 7 bands entered, 6 competed.
Northallerton did not in fact complete their piece on account of having to leave early to go by train.
Prizes: £25, £15, £10, £5
Dec. 19, 2011, 10:07 a.m. Dec. 20, 2012, 11:58 a.m.
1 Stalybridge Old Band John Gladney Jnr Weber Fantasia [arr. Gladney]
2 Boarshurst Silver Band Alexander Owen Oberon [arr. Owen]
3 Earby Band George F. Birkinshaw Rienzi [unknown arranger]
4 Trawden Brass Alexander Owen Rossini's Works / Rossini Fantasia / Reminiscences of Rossini [arr. Owen]
Unknown Result Northallerton Silver Band Unknown
Unknown Result Woodlands Colliery [Durham] Unknown
Withdrawn Meltham and Meltham Mills Band Unknown
